summary: Implements a tree-structured Long Short-Term Memory network using PyTorch and DGL, and supplies a training script that loads the Stanford Sentiment Treebank, constructs graph representations of parse trees, trains the model, and evaluates sentiment classification performance.
business_intent: Provide a reference implementation for researchers and developers to experiment with hierarchical neural models for natural language processing, facilitating reproducible sentiment analysis experiments and showcasing the integration of graph neural networks with deep learning frameworks.
